featured.headline: Jira’s latest update allows AI agents and humans to work side by side
featured.summary: Atlassian is unveiling "agents in Jira" which gives users the ability to assign and manage work given to AI agents the same as humans. ...

secondary_1.headline: Adobe Firefly’s video editor can now automatically create a first draft from footage

secondary_2.headline: Amazon’s AI-powered Alexa+ gets new personality options
